titles.title: To prohibit the imposition by the Federal Government of global budgets, health care premium caps, and similar limits on private health care expenditures in geographic areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 2/24/1994--Introduced. Prohibits any Federal official, employee, or agency from imposing, through a global budget, a cap on health insurance premiums or any other limit on private health care expenditures which has an adverse impact on the health care choices of individuals in one or more U.S. geographic areas.
